name: 'Toy Story 2' Minutiae, Part 4 Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: When the real Buzz shows up at Al's apartment, the toys are confused as to which Buzz is their friend. How does the real Buzz prove his ID?
questions.correct: opens the other Buzz's helmet, then shows them the 'ANDY' on his foot
options: gives Woody the kiss that Bo Peep gave him
questions.explanation:
opens the other Buzz's helmet, then shows them the 'ANDY' on his foot.

	The new Buzz starts gasping as if he can't breathe.

questions.text: Woody first tells the rescue team that he's going to Japan with the Roundup Gang. What happens to change his mind?
questions.correct: He listens to Woody on TV singing 'You've Got a Friend In Me'
options: He sees Stinky Pete leaving his box, realizing that it was him that was manipulating them all
He looks at Slinky Dog's sad eyes
He thinks about being in a display case for the rest of his life
questions.explanation:
He listens to Woody on TV singing 'You've Got a Friend In Me'.

	A little boy grabs the Woody puppet on TV lovingly. Woody scrapes off the paint covering 'ANDY' on his boot. He then runs to call back Buzz, then gets the idea to invite the Roundup Gang to come with him and become Andy's toys.

questions.text: Al comes back before Woody can leave with Jessie and Bullseye. He gets in his car and heads to the airport. How does the rescue team follow them?
questions.correct: They hijack the Pizza Planet deliveryman's truck
options: They grab onto Buzz and fly there
They hop in a cab that's also headed to the airport
questions.explanation:
They hijack the Pizza Planet deliveryman's truck.

	Buzz Lightyear: Not a flying toy.

questions.text: Once at the airport, the rescue team gets in a pet carrier and gets loaded onto the baggage carousel. Unfortunately, they see two cases that look like the ones that the Roundup Gang is in. What ends up being in the one that doesn't have them?
questions.explanation:
camera equipment.

	The toys that open the other case use the flash equipment to stun Stinky Pete.

questions.text: After they overcome Stinky Pete, they stick him in the side pouch of a Barbie backpack. What's the name of the little girl whose pack it is?
questions.explanation:
Amy.

	'She's an artist!' Emily was Jessie's owner, Hannah was Andy's neighbor in 'Toy Story', Molly is Andy's sister.

questions.text: The case leaves the carousel area with Jessie still in it. It gets loaded onto Al's plane to Japan. Woody get to the luggage compartment of the plane and finds the case. When he opens the case, Jessie is still having doubts about going home with Woody. What finally convinces her to go with Woody?
questions.correct: finding out that Andy has a little sister
options: finding out that Andy has cable TV
finding out that Andy no longer lives next to Sid
questions.explanation:
finding out that Andy has a little sister.

	'Well why didn't you say so!' - Jessie

questions.text: After Woody and Jessie get off the plane, what other two toys are on the runway with them?
How do the toys get back to Andy's?
What melody is Andy 'singing' when he gets home from camp and runs upstairs?
questions.explanation:
'William Tell Overture'.

	'William Tell Overture' was the theme for the 'Lone Ranger'.

questions.text: Andy is excited seeing his new toys, Jessie and Bullseye. What new name does he call her (not knowing she's Jessie)?
questions.explanation:
Bazooka Jane.

	And Bullseye became her jet-propelled horse.
